text:
@Acosta WTF...does that creepy sounding logic even mean....What kinda life ..the thousands who have died to COVID-19 ..are expendable...I'm missing something here obviously ..but we're talking about Dr Doom soooooo,  no darkness is dark enough ...
#TrumpsReopenMadness
